q: why does the man prune trees
pred: The man is pruning the trees to maintain their health and appearance. Pruning is an essential part of tree care as it helps to remove dead, diseased, or damaged branches, which can lead to the spread of diseases or pests. Additionally, pruning can also help to promote the growth of new branches and improve the overall structure of the tree. By pruning the trees, the man is ensuring that they remain healthy and visually appealing.
